option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
the input file is a map format file.
filename of the cnvmap format file to trim. If this is omitted, the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Extract meta-data from a cnvmap format file and store them as an XML document.

description.p: Extract meta-data from a cnvmap format file and store them as an XML document.
The XML is written to standard output.

example.description: Extract meta-data from the file "20040830.map" and write it to the file "20040830.map.xml".
